title: US announces land strikes to start 'very soon'; analysts warn of war risk but see path to talks
description: Less than a week after he threatened to carry out strikes to deter what the US calls "Venezuelan drug traffickers" in his Thanksgiving remarks, US President Donald Trump announced on Tuesday local time US ground strikes in the Caribbean targeting traffickers …
